body:
Excuse me, but so honestly, I’d most definitely love to read this Hentai Manga in English/Chinese Traditional/Korean/French Versions asap, please.

Once again, thank you so much! Amen!

Excuse me, but so who could go upload both the Chinese Traditional and English versions (with no rewrites) of this Hentai Manga asap, please?

Once again, thank you all so much! Amen!
please translate into English as soon as possible
